resources.string: View all tests in this phase
Sign in to access study materials, practice tests, and track your progress
By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Complete tests to see your OLQ profile and track progress
Create a batch and share the invite code with students
The screening phase consists of OIR and PPDT tests. Your performance determines eligibility for Phase 2.
Phase 2 includes Psychology Tests, GTO Tasks, and Personal Interview. These comprehensively evaluate your officer-like qualities.

Your PIQ will be reviewed by assessors during the SSB interview. A well-filled PIQ helps them prepare better questions for you.

Describe how others perceive you and how you see yourself
Total time: 15 minutes for all questions
You can skip and return to questions during the test

Upgrade to Pro or Premium for a more realistic interviewer voice
Premium voice unavailable, using standard voice
Your interview has been analyzed. Tap to view your OLQ assessment.
We couldn\'t complete the analysis. Please try again later.
Your interview is complete! Results will be ready shortly. We\'ll notify you when they\'re available.
No past interviews yet. Complete your first interview to see results here.
1. You will be shown a tactical scenario image for 60 seconds
2. Observe the situation carefully: obstacles, terrain, resources available
3. After viewing, you will have 29 minutes to write your planning response
4. Your plan should include clear objectives, resource allocation, and execution strategy
Observe the tactical scenario carefully. Identify obstacles, resources, and constraints that will affect your plan.
Describe your tactical plan: objectives, strategy, resource allocation, team roles, timeline, and contingencies‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢ Define clear objectives and success criteria
‚Ä¢ Assign roles and responsibilities to team members
‚Ä¢ Consider time management and contingency plans
Your plan will be reviewed by your instructor.
Your instructor will review your planning response and provide detailed feedback
Your progress will be saved. You can continue later from where you left off.
Once submitted, you cannot make changes.
Please review your response carefully before submitting. You cannot make changes after submission.
